title: (43800) Valls - 11 Carrer Vapor de Maó
description: Parking with space for motorhomes

title: (43800) Valls - 3 Muralla del Carme
description: Free municipal parking that has 7 places for motorhomes and although they are signposted the majority are occupied by cars. The municipal police does not take responsibility and does not fine the cars parked in those places.

title: (43800) Valls - 2 Avinguda del Fornàs
description: This is not specifically reserved for motorhomes but there is always plenty of room and large spaces. Free parking with swimming pool in front and playground if you continue down and skate park.

title: (43800) Valls - 12 Passeig President Tarradellas
description: A large parking lot, with stony surfaces, right next to the police station. Supermarket and washing machines around the corner. Downtown within easy walking distance.

title: (43800) Valls - 82 Carrer Blanquers
description: Closed and guarded parking for trucks with space for motorhomes and vans. Emptying and filling of water and petrol station with restaurant and showers. Sunday closed the restaurant and shower.

title: (43812) Puigpelat - 3 Carrer dels Pins
description: Playground area typical of town, but incorporating picnic tables and benches. Maintained area, with bins, banks and a fountain.

title: (43491) Picamoixons - 4 Carrer Josep Margarit
description: Parking behind the town school and next to the road (a train passes by at night, but we don't hear it). During the week, in the morning cars arrive to go to school (during the school year, of course). In the village there is a swimming pool, a shop with bulk products and bread, and a bar. There is a pharmacy but it is not open every day. There is a fountain and rubbish in the park below. The site is lightly lit. We don't know if an AC or a large van can fit in. We entered with an L2H2. If not, at the entrance of the town there is another accessible parking. If instead of entering the car park (on the right), you turn left and you will find another place to park. The site is protected. During the night we sleep alone. The townspeople park some cars.

title: (43491) Valls - Carrer de la Font P
title_short: (43491) Valls - Carrer de la Font P
description: Drinking water source, easily accessible and next to the village.

title: (43812) Puigpelat - 5 Avinguda dels Països Catalans
description: Land parking in the center of the city. There is a house next to where you can eat. At 1 min there is a pharmacy and a bread oven. There is also a fountain at the entrance to the sports center.

title: (43144) Vallmoll - 24 Camí dels Morts
description: Area with 2 tables and benches. Swings, slide ... under the pines. Lots of shade.

title: (43813) Alió - Unnamed Road
description: Old soccer field that can be used as a car park. In front is the village pool that opens from June 24 to early September. For a nominal fee you can use the pool which has toilets, showers and bar service.

title: (43887) Nulles - 1 Passeig de l'Estació
description: Nulles quiet town Parking next to the train track (few trains pass). In front of us we have the coperativa of wine. (White wine Seduction is very good). You have a fountain and a very close children's park, in the direction of the village.

title: (43490) Vilaverd - C-240z
description: Just a convenient little spot along the road. Not to hard to get into and reasonably flat. there is a bit of noise from the highway but it's not loud.

title: (43460) Alcover - Avg. Catalunya
description: Area very well set up in terms of emptying and filling water services, but not for spending the night, because although the spaces are correct, it is located next to a very conflictive nightclub. During the night they make a bottle, skids with cars and loudspeakers at full power. According to information, the city council allows it and is not interested in finding solutions. Especially on weekends it is inadvisable to stay overnight, due to the risk of drunk people approaching you.

title: (43450) Les Hortasses - TV-7044
description: Ample free parking with shade and quite flat. Attached to a mountain road with no traffic at night. It has no services.

title: (43460) Alcover - 5 TV 7041
description: Ample parking next to the little traveled road.

title: (43460) Alcover - 68B Avinguda de Reus
description: New overnight zone for up to 48 hours in Alcover. no type of service for the camper / ac. plot on the outskirts of the town, from here you can visit the town with all kinds of services and excursions to el niu de l'aliga, Mont-ral....

title: (43460) Alcover -
description:
Nice little tray available to welcome you with a nice view of Tarragona.
relatively easy access for van / van, can be a little more complex for long vehicles even if the platform can accommodate you.
A ruin and a room for sheep (odorless) will be your landmark but nothing prevents you from going further.
Very nice to see the stars and enjoy the pretty view.
PLEASE LEAVE THE SPACE AS CLEAN SEE MORE THAN WHEN YOU ARRIVED.

title: (43812) Bràfim - 6 Avinguda de Loreto
description:
Ground parking in the center of this quiet little town.
The places are not marked, but they take about 50 vehicles.
Starting point to visit one of its wineries or its various restaurants.
At night it is illuminated.
We have slept very peacefully, without any noise.

title: (43154) Les Gunyoles - Camí del Molí
description: Parking in quiet village with swings and drinking fountain. Routes by bike and on foot. Many places.

title: (43490) - 4 Diseminado Cm Mongois
description: Picnic area with tables and benches. Ask permission for its use.

title: (43810) El Pla de Santa Maria - 10 Carrer Santes Creus
title_short: (43810) El Pla de Santa Maria - 10 Carrer Santes Creus
description: Large parking in the center of town, is quiet, next to the municipal swimming pools.

title: (43810) El Pla de Santa Maria - 16 Carrer Les Escoles
title_short: (43810) El Pla de Santa Maria - 16 Carrer Les Escoles
description: Next to the pavilion of the municipality. Quiet zone. No facilities.

description: Parquing of land next to the Museum and the center of the town

title: (43760) El Morell - 299 Lloc Hospitals
description: Good place to sleep on weekends a lot of movement because it is a free barbecue area near the river

title: (43814) Vila-rodona - 14 Cami C

title: (43811) Figuerola del Camp - 13 Carrer Cami dels Horts
title_short: (43811) Figuerola del Camp - 13 Carrer Cami dels Horts
description: Quiet place to sleep. We couldn't get to the other parking lot in town because of the height of the car. We left from ski to do the via ferrata, it's an extra 500m but we slept great.

title: (43810) El Pla de Santa Maria - 1 Carrer Garrofer
title_short: (43810) El Pla de Santa Maria - 1 Carrer Garrofer
description: Very calm place. In the bar of the urbanization cheap and familiar menu.

title: (43814) Vila-rodona - 90 Carrer de la Font
description: Picnic area with 4 tables and benches, barbecues, fountain, trash can and good shade. In front of the Gaia river.

title: (43811) Figuerola del Camp - 38 Carrer de Dalt
title_short: (43811) Figuerola del Camp - 38 Carrer de Dalt
description: Quiet place, next to a dirt soccer field, good views and a source of the town very close. It is a little higher than the asphalt parking that is at the beginning

title: (43415) Montblanc - 46 Barri Prenafeta
description: Day and night parking with fountain and containers. Very flat and shady

title: (43415) Rojalons -
description: Un claro al lado de una carretera muy poco transitada. hay un arbolito y hueco para 10 vehículos.

title: (43765) La Secuita - 9 Carretera Valls-tarragona
description: Picnic area.

title: (43460) Alcover - TV-7041
description: Parking of the old mill. Waterfall playground with natural pool. Many historical and natural points of interest nearby.

name: Camping Santes Creus
title: (43815) Camping Santes Creus
description: Place in construction, good environment, friendly, correct services. Photovoltaic electricity and generator.

title: (43812) Montferri - T-204
description: Church of Rocamora ideal to rest the night and visit the surroundings

title: (43459) El Pinetell - 4 Barri Pinatell-P
description: Location with beautiful views of mountains and fields. Departure of mountain biking and hiking, very nice, we spent the night in July 2019.

title: (43810) El Pla de Santa Maria - Unnamed Road
title_short: (43810) El Pla de Santa Maria - Unnamed Road
description: Take the small road indicated by the sign "barracks of pedra seca", follow this road for 1 km minimum, then you will find small paths everywhere to stop you. Place in the wilderness, you can also visit the dry stone houses, not recommended for motorhomes

title: (43415) Rojalons -
description: A place to park and spend the night at the entrance to the turnoff from the road to the village of Rajolons. You can access the via ferrata from here or park higher up. Quiet and fairly flat site.

title: (43459) Montblanc - TV-7044
description: Very nice spot, just drive a little on the path thah is visible from the road. Choose a nice spot so you are a little bit camouflaged!

title: (43400) Montblanc - 6 Carrer de Morella
description: Quiet area, with spaces to park and spend the night..

title: (43815) La Plana del Molí - 3 Carrer D Ur. Manantials
title_short: (43815) La Plana del Molí - 3 Carrer D Ur. Manantials
description: Picnic area, great family spot because very quiet road, children's games and table qq meters. 2 places max, little shade. very good for the mid season.

title: (43415) Vilaverd - Unnamed Road
description: Font La Vall wild parking lot in the shade of the vegetation

name: Camping Capfun Montblanc Park
title: (43400) Camping Capfun Montblanc Park
description: Montblanc, TV-2421. Camping Montblanc Park. Well appointed with swimming pool and small water park. Superb city tour and good restaurant on the railway line below. great location but it must be noisy in the height of summer.

title: (43815) Santes Creus - El Pla de Santa Maria
title_short: (43815) Santes Creus - El Pla de Santa Maria
description: Quiet, large and well shaded parking at the end of the small tarmac road. Should be reachable with any vehicle.

title: (43815) Aiguamúrcia - Unnamed Road
description: Location at the crossroads of 2 paths. Unobstructed view of the monastery of Santes Creus. Place for a vehicle, no more. Quiet night.

title: (43885) Salomó - Carrerada de Valls al Vendrell
title_short: (43885) Salomó - Carrerada de Valls al Vendrell
description: Place surrounded by nature, no service, very quiet. Some tractors and cyclists during the day. Slightly sloping terrain. Attention, difficult access from Salomo, because very narrow streets. I do not recommend for motorhomes.

title: (43760) El Morell - 10 Carrer Àngel Guimerà
description: Esplanada where parking is allowed at least during the holidays. Near the center. There were many cars and people partying so when you go to sleep it can be uncomfortable but it gets you out of trouble. There is no shadow

title: (43815) Santes Creus - 43815
description: Small parking area located just in front of the monastery with a beautiful view of it. At the edge of a quiet, quiet road. Perfect for visiting the monastery!

title: (43470) La Selva del Camp - 184 Partida Industrial la Silva, Ill
title_short: (43470) La Selva del Camp - 184 Partida Industrial la Silva, Ill
description: Large area with trees and barbecues. To spend the night, it is advisable to park in the area farthest from the railway tracks.

title: (43400) Montblanc - Polígon Pemu 2
description: Quiet area with barbecues and water. Hermitage of Sant Josep de Montblanc. Children's park.

title: (43400) Montblanc - 6B Avinguda Lluís Companys
description: Very wide esplanade of land, accessible with any vehicle.

title: (43815) Aiguamúrcia - 5 Carrer Camp dels Avellaners
description: Municipal car park near the Monastery of Sainte Creus: very beautiful place of historical interest in the Cistercian way.

title: (43140) La Pobla de Mafumet - 8 Carrer La Coma
title_short: (43140) La Pobla de Mafumet - 8 Carrer La Coma
description: Good place to spend a night if you go the road, great esplanade and charming city, in the city there are more places to spend the night, safe place and suitable for many motorhomes or vans.

title: (43400) Montblanc - 1 Carrer Mare Vedruna
description: Parking next to the square and near the San Jordi gate. next to sara's restaurant

title: (43364) Mont-ral - 31 Carrer Ample

title: (43400) Montblanc - 61 Avinguda Manel Ribe
description: We arrived on the weekend of Sant Jordi. And the car parks were marked full or that could not be accessed, we found this place and spent the night there

title: (43364) Mont-ral - 12 TV-7041
description: Peaceful place with view of Mont-Ral. About 100m from the main road on an unpaved road Small vehicle only

title: (43811) Cabra del Campo - TP-2311
description: Picnic area with 2 tables and benches, in the sports center of the town. Very large esplanade for parking on site. Very quiet area

title: (43811) Cabra del Camp - Carrer Principal
description: Ideal for your children / grandchildren a giant statue of Mazinger (the equivalent of the Spanish Goldorak)

title: (43400) Montblanc - 54 Muralla de Santa Tecla
description: At the Tourist Information Office? they told us to park at the back of the building. Really great to visit Montblanc, no service

title: (43400) Montblanc - 20 Carrer Josep Maria Poblet
description: Parking illuminated and quiet, next to unifamimiares houses. The terrain makes a little slope at the end of the apartment, so it is better to stay in the center. near the entrance to the walls

title: (43140) La Pobla de Mafumet - 43 Carrer Mas Blanc
title_short: (43140) La Pobla de Mafumet - 43 Carrer Mas Blanc
description: Very quiet street with a huge playground for children.

title: (43400) Montblanc - 4 Camí de la Parellada
description: Clay road parking at the foot of the ramparts, presence of water fountain

title: (43400) Montblanc - 22 Carrer Pujada de la Serra
title_short: (43400) Montblanc - 22 Carrer Pujada de la Serra
description: Parking at the foot of the ramparts, less crowded than the one below. Passeig de josep Conangla. Slightly sloping.

title: (43400) Montblanc - Camí del Cementeri
description: Parking area without services, quiet, with light, next to a breadmaker and the cemetery, at 1500 meters from Montblanc

title: (43400) Montblanc - 42 Baluard de Santa Anna
description: Land wasteland next to a municipal parking lot. Quiet place for about 10 AC. No shade, just a few cypress trees that shade an AC or two in the morning. A 5-minute walk from the walled enclosure. We have been well and with good views to the north.

title: (43479) L'Albiol - TV-7046
description: The place is set back from the road, which is not very busy. So it is certainly suitable to spend a quiet night on the way to Castell De L'Albilol with various viewpoints and hiking opportunities. We stopped here for a leisurely picnic.

title: (43764) La Cativera -
description:
Quiet place surrounded by isolated nature next to a dam.
you can hear a little the trains and the road in the distance but nothing really bothersome. access by a passable dirt road for a van or a small motorhome.
Please leave this place clean.

title: (43400) Montblanc - 51 Raval Santa Anna
description: Large parking lot Excellent for motorhomes. No problems of space, height or overnight. a few meters from the historic center. Very quiet and safe. 100% recommendable.

title: (43364) Mont-ral - 14 Carrer Ample
description: A wild football field where you can park.

title: (43364) Mont-ral - 29 Carrer Major
description: The place is passing the Pinetell urbanization, it is not in Montral, on one of the paths that go right along the road. You enter through a narrow path, not suitable for motorhomes, only camper and mini camper. Even an esplanade

title: (43470) La Selva del Camp - 3 Carrer de Tarragona
title_short: (43470) La Selva del Camp - 3 Carrer de Tarragona
description: Esplanade of land with a slight but evident slope right next to the motorhome area. It does not have any service. You can stay overnight.

title: (43364) Mont-ral - 2 Plaça Ajuntament
description: It is a very beautiful place. It's in the center of Mon-ral. A very small and comfortable village in the middle of the mountains. There would be about 5 places for cars and vans, but not for motorhomes. This is the starting point for many walks in the forest. You can see its many options on a map that is on the side. There are no services like toilets or picnic tables.

title: () El Pont d'Armentera - Les Planes
description:
Family atmosphere, farm animals, fenced plot, large space, possibility of having light through a generator, practicable access for large vehicles on a dirt road.
5 minutes from the El Pla de Santa María motorway exit and 5 minutes from the town of El Pont d'Armentera with basic services, bar, restaurant, minimarket. Near the mountains of Querol and the Monastery of Santes Creus, in the middle of nature with many beautiful mtb routes.
Pets are accepted on a leash due to the common sense of other animals.
More services will be added over time. Google Maps could take you up a climb that is not the correct path, follow the flat path that will be marked by a cloth at the entrance. Honk the horn once you get to the gate!!

title: (43470) La Selva del Camp - Camí Vell de Reus
title_short: (43470) La Selva del Camp - Camí Vell de Reus
description:
Motorhome area with all the services described.
Paved surface with 10 large spaces + 1 dump site.
Electricity included (max. 400 w.) Supermarket and restaurants a few meters away.

title: (43364) Mont-ral - 30 Coroneta
description: Starting area for hiking trails with flat ground to easily park several vans. A magnificent view of Tarragona below. Trees for shade and very close to a bakery with a very friendly little village. 2 nights spent without problems in peace. In the morning we often come across hikers or climbers.

title: (43400) Montblanc -
description: Parking lot for climbing, mas de la pasquala

title: (43763) Vespella de Gaià - TV-2021
description: A small, flattish roadside parking area up a hill, beneath a ruined castle and close to a few houses. It is also used as the stop for the school bus. Fabulous views down the valley towards the sea. The road is very quiet.

title: (43459) Mont-ral - TV-7044
description: Very quiet place, only accessible by 4x4. The place is a bit uneven and has a slight slope.

title: (43470) La Selva del Campo - TP-7013
description: Quiet esplanade, next to the road and a beautiful stone bridge. Quiet rural area with benches, trees ... "Pont Vell"

title: (43811) Fontscaldetes -
description: It is a very flat and level esplanade at the gates of the small abandoned town of Fontscaldetes which you have to visit because it is beautiful. We have come to sleep more than once since we also have a YouTube channel called RUTA Y MISTERIO dedicated to paranormal investigation. Perfect to disconnect and have complete peace of mind without any noise. Some nice views. PLEASE RESPECT THE PLACE AND TAKE ALL THE DIRT HOME. WE ALWAYS PICK UP SHIT FROM OTHERS. IT'S A SHAME. THANKS A LOT.

title: (43422) Barberà de la Conca - 40 Carrer del Comerç
title_short: (43422) Barberà de la Conca - 40 Carrer del Comerç
description: Free area at the bottom of the wine cooperative. water. changes.

title: (43479) L'Albiol - C/ FONT DE BAIGET
description: Very nice and quiet place next to the refuge/hostel. It is at the entrance to the town of Albiol. At the end of Carrer de la Font de Baiget there is a paved space for two motorhomes and next to it an unpaved area where 5 more can fit.

title: (43459) Farena - 12 Carrer de la Font
description: Free parking, where you can start various routes.

title: (43817) Puente de Armentera - C-37
description: Quiet rest area At the foot of a quiet road and next to a town with basic services. A lot of shade, flat terrain.

title: (43151) Els Pallaresos - 14 Carrer Pallars Sobirà
description: There is no place to stop eating, even sleeping. We alone have lunch and it is very quiet. In the middle of some houses in the urbanization.

title: (43151) Els Pallaresos - 17 Carrer de la Cerdanya
title_short: (43151) Els Pallaresos - 17 Carrer de la Cerdanya
description: Multiple battery parking spaces in urbanized areas, normally empty.

title: (43400) Montblanc - 6 Plaça Plan Parcial 12
description: Station with cheap gas, good services for a stop for breakfast, lunch or dinner. It has a supermarket, a restaurant, water and swings. Possible night

title: () Vilaplana - 5 TV-7045
description: Beautiful and quiet esplanade that enters about 50 meters in a curve of the road that goes from the mussara to l'aixavega. with beautiful views of the mountain and the town of l'aixavega

title: (43764) El Catllar -
description: Large car park in small gravel. Very large. No prohibition for motorhomes. Nor to spend the night there. At school time, a few cars arrive to drop off the children and leave. It is therefore better to be at the back of the parking. Fairly quiet at night and surrounded by greenery. The free area of the village being saturated we came here, and we did well!

title: (43764) - 687B Lloc Moli d'en Fortuny
description: Quiet place for a night close to the road along the stadium for the cars we can't hear them Vehicles not too big or long

title: (43423) Pira - 10 Carrer Cèsar Martinell
description: Parking for trucks but no problem to park, has little use of trucks. 2 minutes from the town center and possible routes. No services

title: (43120) Constantí - 1 Cami l'Almoster
description: Parking site of the Villa Romana de Centcelles located 2 km from the city. No service.

title: (43410) Montblanc - C-14
description: Aire on restaurant. Room closed at night. Free if you eat in the restaurant. Very nice welcome, farm products for sale and served at the table.

title: (43393) Almoster - 12 Carrer Puig d'en Cama
description: Quiet parking on the outskirts of the city. Panateria, bar, tobacconist and a small supermarket in the village. Access through narrow streets, only small vans, see motorhomes.

title: (43130) Tarragona - 2 Carrer del Barranc del Comellar
title_short: (43130) Tarragona - 2 Carrer del Barranc del Comellar
description: Dead end. we have slept right there because we arrived late. There is an accessible and quiet forest area very close at night if a car passes by on the road next door. The temperature is very pleasant. Quiet place to spend a single night.

title: (43120) Constantí - 32 Carrer Mossèn Ramon Bergadà
description: Free parking to spend the day, I highly recommend it next to nature

title: (43764) El Catllar - 17 Carrer de Prades
description: It is recommended to reserve in advance the number available for park4night  subscribers. Small private property (no Service Area) with an access road not recommended for motorhomes longer than 7 meters. Family atmosphere so no more than 3 vans per night allowed. Caravans are also not allowed. 4 km from the world heritage city of Tarragona. Public transport to the city very close. Nearby veterinary hospital. Beaches at 4 km. Supermarkets 2 km. Ideal for motorhomes and equipped vans, ideal parking to visit the city in the heart of nature. (no toilet, box in the vehicle, no shower) electricity and water included.

title: (43130) Tarragona - Carretera de Tarragona
description: Free parking to have a picnic near your vehicle and to see or visit the Roman aqueduct. Do NOT leave your vehicle unattended as many vehicles have been broken into here.

title: (43763) La Nou de Gaià - 7 T-202
description: Great parking space at the entrance to the village next to the road. Mainly flat and level. Also suitable for larger mobile homes. Little traffic, but you can hear the nearby railway line, where the express trains pass.

title: (43717) La Bisbal del Penedès - 1 Carrer Emporda
title_short: (43717) La Bisbal del Penedès - 1 Carrer Emporda
description: Hermitage of Santa Cristina. A very quiet place (December 31) to spend the night with good views. There is a small area with swings but it is very neglected. At the access there is a small stretch of dirt track, in good condition but narrow, it is not recommended for motorhomes or large vehicles, but in a van without problems.

title: (43120) Constantí - 2X Carrer Major
description: A nice park to spend the day and night

title: (43007) Tarragona - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Great viewpoint of Roman Aqueduct. Free parking just off the motorway to have a picnic near your vehicle and to see or visit the Roman aqueduct. Do NOT leave your vehicle unattended as many vehicles have been broken into here.

title: (43422) Ollers - 2 Passeig Moreres
description: Quiet viewpoint with parking spaces with good views. Somewhat narrow access. Large caravans not recommended.

title: (43479) L'Albiol - T-704
description: Small esplanade at the entrance of a lane. There are no services of any kind but the place is quiet and we were able to spend the night without problem. there are trees and shade.

title: (43380) L'Albiol - T-704
description: Quiet place surrounded by forest. Good starting point for mountain biking and hiking, in mushroom season it is also a good place. IMPORTANT not to make noise, it is a natural refuge of wild fauna

title: (43479) L'Albiol - 19 T-704
description: Place surrounded by nature with a view of Tarragona and the sea. Located after a small parking lot. We spent a very peaceful night there. Close to the road but very can pass at night. There was a van when we arrived but more than enough space not to be shy. A few cars in the parking lot in the morning and hikers. may be more crowded in summer

title: (43762) La Riera de Gaià - 3 Carrer Fondo
title_short: (43762) La Riera de Gaià - 3 Carrer Fondo
description: Nice parking area in a small town with a couple of restaurants. We stayed here for a quiet night.

title: (43007) Tarragona - s/n Camí Pont del Diable
title_short: (43007) Tarragona - s/n Camí Pont del Diable
description: Good quiet place to sleep, near the Devil's bridge.

title: (43424) Sarral - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet car park overlooking Sarral. About 10 picnic tables under the trees. Barbeque available. Trash containers. (Closed during my visit, water tap and a restaurant 100m away.) Games for children. Access to CC, van and Caravan.

title: (43718) La Juncosa del Montmell - Unnamed Road
title_short: (43718) La Juncosa del Montmell - Unnamed Road
description: On the edge of a road between the vineyards there are two small tables and a drinking water tap :)

title: (43364) Capafonts -
description: Small esplanade where to park and spend the night. From here you can go down to bathe in the poza les fous.

title: (43430) -
description: Starting point for various walks with the interesting route 4 du bosc pintat. It is a natural park, where I did not spend the night, camping is prohibited but perfect to spend the day. 3 km access road, paved but narrow.

title: (43440) L'Espluga de Francolí - 3 Camí dels Horts
title_short: (43440) L'Espluga de Francolí - 3 Camí dels Horts
description: Esplanade of land without elevation or services. In the shade thanks to the trees there. They build a picnic area with a water point. 2 minutes walk from the Coves de l'Espluga, highly recommended.

title: (43007) Tarragona - s/n Carrer Pairal
description: Large parking lot next to the Loreto picnic area. Not very clean but close to town and good choice. walk in the forest around the car park barbecue area, and water tap (not drinkable)

title: (43440) L'Espluga de Francolí - Avinguda dels Països Catalans
title_short: (43440) L'Espluga de Francolí - Avinguda dels Països Catalans
description: Just behind the sports hall, large quiet car park. Water point at the kindergarten just opposite.

title: (43440) L'Espluga de Francolí - TV-2336
description:
Cemetery car park
no services .

title: (43203) Reus - Av. de la Pau
description: Large parking lot at the cemetery. Very nice cemetery.

title: (43448) - TV-7007
description: Parking of the Poblet monastery which is a superb stopover!

title: (43718) La Juncosa del Montmell -
description: Nice little viewpoint, accessible after about 3 km of gravel road. Relatively flat place to park a van- max 2. Good starting point for walks. There are no facilities, take your rubbish with you!

title: (43718) - 31 Avinguda Josep Tarradellas
description: Very quiet place in terms of sports facilities, at the entrance of the village. Drinking water fountain and garbage can. Beautiful view of the vines on the terrace. Very calm. Had a quiet night.

title: (43411) Blancafort - TV-2337
description: Quiet place next to the road. I have spent a very quiet night.

title: (43448) Poblet - 11 T-700
description: Simple roadside parking, opposite Poblet Monastery. Fountain below the monastery towards the crossroads of the T700 and the T7002 for the full of water.

title: (43440) L'Espluga de Francolí - 10 Carrer del Serè
title_short: (43440) L'Espluga de Francolí - 10 Carrer del Serè
description: Parking stadium, quiet place to spend the night on a flat ground

title: (43204) Reus - 38 Carrer de la Diversitat
description: Parking without overnight prohibition, near the city center. In the polygon there are bars, mechanics, paddle, climbing wall, etc.

title: (43430) Vimbodí - Unnamed Road
description: Parking Natural parc office

title: (43884) Bonastre - 43 Carrer Muralla
description: Esplanade of terra ben leveled prop of the road i of the collegi del poble. Aprop d'un restaurant

title: (43718) - Unnamed Road
description: Castle parking in ruins of Montmell

title: (43204) Tarragona - 6 Cami Bassa de les Cabres
title_short: (43204) Tarragona - 6 Cami Bassa de les Cabres
description: Small car park under trees at the edge of a gravel road. Quiet location next to the freeway, otherwise undisturbed. There is a large storage area for equipment on the street, but there is still nothing going on here.

title: (43884) Bonastre -
description: Large concrete slab across from the graveyard. No signs prohibiting camping. Probably the best spot in the area. Water fountain in the town nearby

title: (43007) Tarragona - 8 Avinguda Puig i Valls
description:
A nice spot for a night. Probably not allowed to leave the vehicle with no one inside but proper for spending a night. Beautiful view point on Tarragona.
Warning - quite slopy. Access for medium vehicles max (~7m long or smaller) due to narrow road.
Beware of cables running above the road, probably ~3,5m height limit (see picture).

title: (43008) Tarragona - 80 Extrarradio Reste Poligon
description: It is a dirt track in the middle of the forest, there is space to leave a van or motorhome on one side of the lane and not obstruct the passage. Very little trafficked area, very quiet. The only but is that it is located between the 2 highways and you can hear the traffic in the background, but there are about 100 meters of forest and they muffle the sound quite a bit. The dirt track is passable by low vehicles.

title: (43206) Reus - 108 Passeig Nord
description: Public parking area away from the city and quiet. Supermarket nearby. North promenade of the city used as a starting point for walks and sports by the residents of the town. No shade in some areas.

title: (43204) Reus - 61C Avinguda de Marià Fortuny
description:
Large esplanade where to park and spend the night
Less than 10 minutes walk there are:
Gas station, Lidl, Carrefour, Mc Donalds, Shopping Center.
You can visit Reus (city of Gaudí) by walking

title: (43005) Tarragona - 2 Carrer de Guillem Oliver
description: Dead end street, very quiet and with police nearby. It has the ideal francoli park nearby to walk the dog and 15 minutes walk from the center of tarragona.

title: (43717) La Bisbal del Penedès - 18 Carrer Zamora
title_short: (43717) La Bisbal del Penedès - 18 Carrer Zamora
description: Good place to rest, hidden and respectable.

name: Camping Las Palmeras Store
title: (43007) Camping Las Palmeras Store
description: Tarragona, 241 Carrer Via Augusta. The campsite Las Palmeras de Tarragona is located in a beautiful place on the coast of Costa Dorada, land surrounded by nature, nestled between palm trees and pines.

title: (43007) Tarragona - 6 Carreró A
description: Free water Repsol station

title: (43007) Tarragona - 9 Camí Nou Budallera
description: Quiet road to spend the night and enjoy one of the lungs of the city of Tarragona. Wc: the forest! 10 min from the center of the city and close to beaches

title: (43411) Blancafort - 17 Avinguda Onze de Setembre
description: Picnic area, with tables, barbecues and a fountain. There are swings for children. There is a bar and a public pool in summer. Very quiet place.

title: (43007) Tarragona - 10 Camí del Llorito
description: Square dirt and flat, free and quiet. Not nice to see but 2 minutes from the ciutat velle. Comfortable but no shade, at night illuminated

title: (43002) Tarragona - 21 Carrer de San Auguri
description: Several taps with drinking water. Only to fill the bottles, not to connect the hose.

name: Camping Las Salinas
title: (43007) Camping Las Salinas
description:
Camping Las Salinas
Directly on the beach. Nice spot with good restaurant. Bathrooms don't have toilet paper and toilet seats. Nice owners. Even though next to train line it is very quiet.
Price is good and supermarket at camping Las Palmas.

title: (43007) Tarragona - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Possibility to empty gray and black water and fill drinking water. Also possibility to shower (men and women separated). Ask for it at the restaurant cashier. We had a great shower!

title: (43007) Tarragona - 6 Cami B
description: Stadium parking

title: (43007) Tarragona - 32 Camí de l'Ermita de Loreto
title_short: (43007) Tarragona - 32 Camí de l'Ermita de Loreto
description: Ermita de la salud, accesible, with drinking water, noisy because highway nearby

title: (43002) Tarragona - Avinguda Catalunya
description: Ideal to visit the very quiet city on August 1

title: (43007) Tarragona - 460 Autovia del Mediterrani
description: Service station with free filling and draining water. It also has a picnic area with tables. Hot shower.

title: (43002) Tarragona - Av. Catalunya
description: New and fast laundromat. There are only 3 washing units (9,14,19kg) and two big 17kg dryers. Washing is 30min and drying 20min with increments of 5min/1euro but it's no need if you select hot air. Payment by card or coins accepted. I paid 14 euros for wash&dry 15kg laundary, all done in 30 25min.

title: (43007) Tarragona - 2B Carretera Platja Llarga
description: Beautiful cove away from the crowd. Shady parking on the creek. Only downside, the train passes right next but the place is so magical that we forget the train. Picnic tables under the pines close to the beach with bins provided, but not very clean. Showers on the beach. Pedestrian walk on the sea front. Ideal for families or couples

title: (43884) Bonastre - Carrer del Sagrat
description:
Little sidestop on a gravy road before a dead end (not for a vey big vehicle). Right under a big electric pole so easy to find, makes some noise of electricity passing in the cables but we got used to it after 10 minutes, really no big deal.
Beautiful mountains view around and sky full of stars good visible as not much light pollution in the area :)

title: (43884) Bonastre - Carrer del Sagrat
description: It‘s not easy to find accessible parking for a big vehicle in this park. We found this clean spot on the side of a very quiet but paved side road, surrounded by nature, hiking/jogging trails, and mysterious caves. We loved it. It was also easy to rotate the caravan on the spot when leaving. Be aware, one caravan takes up almost the entire room available, maybe another van would fit, but no more.

title: (43007) Tarragona - 5B Camí Ermita Salut-I
description: Dirt parking without services and without shade, but it is completely free and there is enough space (about 60 spaces) even for larger vehicles. There are no good views, but you can spend the night and the best thing is that it is very close to the historic center of Tarragona. For one night it works perfectly.

title: () Altafulla -
description:
At the edge of a road not very busy with plenty of room.
/!\ chaotic path because rocks are on the way
you have to access it by "El camí d'altafulla à la nou" because coming directly from the highway the path is much more chaotic and impassable without 4x4

title: (43380) La Mussara -
description: Next to the mussara area of land where several vans and cars fit. at this time of year it is mushroom season and since it doesn't arrive soon, everything is full. In the refuge itself you can only spend the night paying but there are several flat areas along the road where you can park and spend the night. The good thing about it is that it is close to the mussara and many routes leave from here

title: (43884) Bonastre - Carrer del Sagrat
description: Small corner surrounded by nature in the mountains, 15 minutes from the beach. Possibility of putting two vans See more? perfect for a quiet night and a beautiful sunrise. On the other hand, there is no shadow.

title: (43007) Tarragona - 13A Camí Budallera
description: Parking, unguarded esplanade. Free. 5 min from the beach on foot. Water point in a small park nearby

title: (43204) Reus - 34 Carrer del Roser
description: Automatic laundry . Free wi-fi. There are no parking places nearby, you need to park further and come by foot.

title: (43007) Tarragona - 1 Passeig de Torroja
description: Day parking right near the old town of Tarragona. About 10 minutes to the city wall. Parking fee 1 euro for the whole day.

name: Las Palmeras Camping & Bungalow Hotel
title: (43007) Las Palmeras Camping & Bungalow Hotel
description: campsite on the beach

name: La Musara
title: (43380) La Musara
description: In this place, there is an active shelter worn by a young and very friendly couple. It is possible to sleep inside the shelter but for those who come with our campers and campers allow us to be in a wooded area with grass. There is also a construction with services equipped with shower and toilet. The downside is that there is no water to change or plug in, but spending two days is a spectacular place. From there, there are several hiking and mountain biking trails.

title: (43364) Capafonts - TV-7041
description: Parking near the village. On the other side of the football field there is a fountain. Ideal for hiking and tourist information point.

title: (43201) Reus - 3V Plaça de Morlius
description: Automatic laundry Speed Queen, next is a childrens playground with drinking water tap, some parking places around, quite near to the centre, cafes, shops. Laundry is open from 07:00- 22:00 Accepts only cash or special SpeedQueen cart.

title: (43893) Altafulla - 35B Carrer Cami de l'Ermita
description: Hermitage of Sant Antoni in Altafulla, with tables for picnic and fountain. 15 minutes from the city, with a very old town and castle and near the beach. On December 29, we spent the night without company. In the afternoon and in the morning, there are dog walkers.

name: Camping Caledonia
title: (43007) Camping Caledonia
description: Camping calédonia accessible to motorhomes. Great grassy site and dishes. Camping all services, emptying area and filling. Very welcome in French and the cheapest in the area this season. Access to the beautiful tamarit beach by a path in the woods, 15 minutes walk. Pool and large playground. Opportunity to visit the village Atlafulla by the same path. Only downside, the proximity of the railway as on all this coast. We recommend.

title: (43204) Reus - 1A Carrer de Mas del Tallapedra
title_short: (43204) Reus - 1A Carrer de Mas del Tallapedra
description: Car park. Park with water

title: (43006) Tarragona - 6 Carrer del Francolí
description: 12 picnic tables

title: (43006) Tarragona - 5 Urbanització Riu Clar
description: An easily accessible fountain in a park near the highway.

title: (43004) Tarragona - 10 Carrer Méndez Núñez
description: Day parking

title: (43006) Tarragona - T-721
description: Paid parking per day 9am-8pm, free Saturday and Sunday. Probably fine over night as no signs prohibiting.

title: (43005) Tarragona - 29 Carrer Josep M Terrasa
description: Parking managed by a social project. Inserted in a park with shaded parking, games for children, fountains and kiosk.

title: (43816) Querol - 1 Passeig de la Font
description: Parking in the town of Querol. Flat area, very good access. Restaurant bar 200m walk from the same road.

title: (43893) Altafulla - 6I Ronda de la Creueta
description: Quiet parking, school area, there is a park next door and a fountain. quiet area to spend the night away from the bustle of the beach

title: (43007) Tarragona - 16 Carrer Ernest Lluch
description: Parking all along Carrer Ernest Lluch street. bike path and pedestrian. 15 minutes from the Roman amphitheater. great mercadonia next door. perfect for visiting the Roman city. free without service. beach at 10 minutes.

title: (43204) Reus - 24 Carrer Mas de l'Abelló
description: Drinking fountain with parking spaces along the road.

title: (43007) Tarragona - 16 Carrer Ernest Lluch
description: Supermarket parking lot

title: (43380) La Mussara -
description: Flat in the middle of the forest, you enter through the car park dels avencs, just as you reach the car park the path on the right hand side, continue along the path and turn right again when you see another path. Quiet and flat place, I have slept alone and no one has passed, little trafficked place unlike the previous car park. Dirt road, I have passed with a renault master and without problem

title: (43884) Bonastre - Unnamed Road
description:
Now this is what I call remote.. Just mountains and zizikies around in the woods.. Awesome if you want to run away from civilisation :) 
Great hiking tract beside. Could accommodate up to 6 camper vans but not too wide vehicles as road is rough to get here.

title: (43893) Altafulla - 14 Carrer del Migdia
description: Laundry machines at the end of the Caprabo supermarket car park

title: (43412) Solivella - 26 Carrer Garcia Salado
description: Parking inside the town but away from the urban area. It is wide and flat, with some shade and very quiet. It is marked as a parking lot for a nearby restaurant but it is used openly. The town is very quiet and offers a sense of security. There is a bakery, grocery store and a bar/restaurant. It is very nice but you can hear the bell tower 24 hours a day, every 15 minutes. We have spent two nights and no problem.

title: (43884) La Vinya de Bonastre - Unnamed Road
title_short: (43884) La Vinya de Bonastre - Unnamed Road
description: Nice little place to spend a night, view of the sea and the city, we were 2 DEFENDERS and had a great night.

title: (43008) Tarragona - 343 Extrarradio Reste Poligon
description: Repsol petrol station. Free water, laundry machine. Open from 6h to 22h every day.

title: (43380) Vilaplana - T-704
description: Parking next to the road to start the excursion to the Simas de La Febró. Very quiet place

title: (43717) La Bisbal del Penedès -
description: Highway rest area. Ideal to stop to eat with tables and shade.

title: (43884) Bonastre -
description: Small corner above the road sheltered from view, very easy to access, next to an electric pilone, flat. At the entry of a private property, be careful not to obstruct the entrance. We spent the night there without problem, the road can be busy, very quiet. And don't forget, nature welcomes us so let's respect it. Pick up your waste.

title: (43380) Vilaplana - 26 Carrer Doctor March
description: Drinking fountain near a parking lot (just a little bit up the hill). Only for filling bottles or things like that.

title: (43380) Vilaplana - 31 Carrer Doctor March
description: Municipal parking for vehicles. With water source.

title: (43008) Tarragona - 95 Extrarradio Reste Poligon
description: El Buffet, traditional Spanish cuisine, all you can eat, hot and cold buffet, soup, dessert counter. Free showers

title: (43412) Solivella - 80 Carretera de Montblanc-Artesa
description: Just a water point. Parking of last resort !!

title: (43380) Tarragona - Unnamed Road
description: Public parking, at street level not very busy. Views of the village of Vilaplana. It is a small viewpoint. Asphalted area, central level area, in the lateral squares there is a little slope

title: (43005) Tarragona - 15 Carrer de Francesc Bastos
description: Covered and guarded parking, ideal for parking with a small van (height limit 2.1m) and going to visit the city.

name: Camping Torre de la Móra
title: (43008) Camping Torre de la Móra
description: Torre de la Mora, a beautiful, well-kept campsite.  Great laid out spa and games area opposite the reception. Small playgrounds for smaller children also on the square itself. Pitches with a view of the beach in the first row. Partly quite winding, it was ok with our van 6m.

title: (43008) Tarragona - 80 Avinguda Mediterrani
description: Parking facing the sea near restaurant

name: Camping Trillas Platja Tamarit
title: (43008) Camping Trillas Platja Tamarit
description:
Campsite Trillas Platja Tamarit
more than 100 motorhome and tent pitches
large pitches
restaurant
Very nice home
bungalows

title: (43430) - 33 Carrer Torrents
description: Hermitage of the Déu dels torrents pond. Dining tables with good shade trees. Source, river side. Very calm neighborhood. You will be able to visit the chapel during visiting hours .

title: (43380) Vilaplana - 23 T-704
description: Esplanade of land in the shade of pine trees. Peaceful place. The access is a slightly broken path but it is well accessed.

title: (43202) Reus - 8 Carrer del Doctor Frias
description: Parking with 4 places reserved for motorhomes

title: (43005) Tarragona - 18 Passeig de la Independència
description: Municipal parking lot convenient for parking and going to town or shopping nearby. However this car park is not for large vehicles such as motorhomes but rather for converted vans. Day parking.

title: (43893) Altafulla - 12 Passatge de la Barceloneta
description: Parking lot
